channel.title: Twitter @OpenAI
channel.description: OpenAI’s mission is to ensure that artificial general intelligence benefits all of humanity. We’re hiring: https://t.co/dJGr6LgzPA - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

item.title: Paul M. Nakasone brings world-class cybersecurity expertise to OpenAI’s Board of Directors, helping us deliver on our mission by protecting our syste...
item.description: Paul M. Nakasone brings world-class cybersecurity expertise to OpenAI’s Board of Directors, helping us deliver on our mission by protecting our systems from increasingly sophisticated bad actors. https://openai.com/index/openai-appoints-retired-us-army-general/
item.author: OpenAI

item.title: Protecting the privacy and security of our users is core to our mission. Here’s how we safeguard your data today: https://openai.com/consumer-privacy...

item.author: OpenAI

item.title: We want to clarify some inadvertent confusion. Our strategic cloud relationship with Microsoft is unchanged. The partnership with OCI enables OpenAI t...
item.description:
We want to clarify some inadvertent confusion.  

Our strategic cloud relationship with Microsoft is unchanged.

The partnership with OCI enables OpenAI to use the Azure AI platform on OCI infrastructure for inference and other needs.

All pre-training of our frontier models
item.author: OpenAI

item.title: We’re partnering with Apple to integrate ChatGPT into iOS, iPadOS, and macOS—coming later this year: https://openai.com/apple
item.description: We’re partnering with Apple to integrate ChatGPT into iOS, iPadOS, and macOS—coming later this year: https://openai.com/apple

item.title: We are excited to welcome two leaders with the right experience, skills, and values to push the mission forward. @thefriley is joining as Chief Financ...
item.description: We are excited to welcome two leaders with the right experience, skills, and values to push the mission forward. @thefriley is joining as Chief Financial Officer, and @kevinweil as Chief Product Officer. https://openai.com/index/openai-welcomes-cfo-cpo/
item.author: OpenAI

item.title: Re We’re sharing a visualizer of firing patterns, and sharing the code and techniques with the research community to foster further exploration: http...
item.description:
Re We’re sharing a visualizer of firing patterns, and sharing the code and techniques with the research community to foster further exploration:

https://openaipublic.blob.core.windows.net/sparse-autoencoder/sae-viewer/index.html
item.author: OpenAI

item.title: We're sharing progress toward understanding the neural activity of language models. We improved methods for training sparse autoencoders at scale, dis...
item.description: We're sharing progress toward understanding the neural activity of language models. We improved methods for training sparse autoencoders at scale, disentangling GPT-4’s internal representations into 16 million features—which often appear to correspond to understandable concepts.
item.author: OpenAI

item.title: A snapshot of the security architecture we’ve designed to protect our research infrastructure and frontier model training. We hope this will benefit ...
item.description: A snapshot of the security architecture we’ve designed to protect our research infrastructure and frontier model training. We hope this will benefit other AI research labs and security professionals (and we’re hiring). https://openai.com/index/securing-research-infrastructure-for-advanced-ai/
item.author: OpenAI

item.title: All ChatGPT Free users can now use browse, vision, data analysis, file uploads, and GPTs.
item.description:
All ChatGPT Free users can now use browse, vision, data analysis, file uploads, and GPTs.


OpenAI: We're opening up access to our new flagship model, GPT-4o, and features like browse, data analysis, and memory to everyone for free (with limits). https://openai.com/index/gpt-4o-and-more-tools-to-chatgpt-free/
item.author: OpenAI

item.title: We’re collaborating with WAN-IFRA on a global accelerator program to assist over 100 news publishers in exploring and integrating AI in their newsroo...
item.description:
We’re collaborating with WAN-IFRA on a global accelerator program to assist over 100 news publishers in exploring and integrating AI in their newsrooms.


WAN-IFRA: WAN-IFRA and OpenAI Launch Global AI Accelerator for Newsrooms #WNMC24 https://wan-ifra.org/2024/05/wan-ifra-and-openai-launch-global-ai-accelerator-for-newsrooms/
item.author: OpenAI

item.title: We’re announcing a content and product partnership with The Atlantic.
item.description:
We’re announcing a content and product partnership with The Atlantic.


nxthompson: I am delighted that @theatlantic now has a strategic content & product partnership with @openai. Our stories will be discoverable in their new products and we'll be working with them to figure out new ways that AI can help serious, independent media : https://www.theatlantic.com/press-releases/archive/2024/05/atlantic-product-content-partnership-openai/678529/
item.author: OpenAI

item.title: We’re announcing a content and product partnership with Vox Media.
item.description:
We’re announcing a content and product partnership with Vox Media.


Vox Media: We’re excited to partner with @openai to help inform ChatGPT and to develop innovative products for our audiences and advertising partners. https://www.voxmedia.com/2024/5/29/24166483/vox-media-openai-strategic-content-and-product-partnership
item.author: OpenAI

item.title: We’ve heard questions about how we chose the voices in ChatGPT, especially Sky. We are working to pause the use of Sky while we address them. Read mo...
item.description:
We’ve heard questions about how we chose the voices in ChatGPT, especially Sky. We are working to pause the use of Sky while we address them.

Read more about how we chose these voices: https://openai.com/index/how-the-voices-for-chatgpt-were-chosen/
item.author: OpenAI

item.title: We're rolling out interactive tables and charts along with the ability to add files directly from Google Drive and Microsoft OneDrive into ChatGPT. Av...
item.description: We're rolling out interactive tables and charts along with the ability to add files directly from Google Drive and Microsoft OneDrive into ChatGPT. Available to ChatGPT Plus, Team, and Enterprise users over the coming weeks. https://openai.com/index/improvements-to-data-analysis-in-chatgpt/
item.author: OpenAI
